name: Slimekiller
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Slimekiller is a basic turn-based game with roguelike elements. Control the greatest killer of slimes and battle your way through a near infinite amount of procedurally generated levels. Improve your character, acquire power-ups (soon), and avoid death at all costs!

Each session will accumulate a score, visible at the top of the screen. Use this score to compete against fellow Slimekillers. I have plans for a formal leaderboard.

Enjoy!
